document_data.name: Sehlmari Ssemm
document_data.mainbody: '''Sehlmari Ssemm''' was a mercenary recruiter in [[Westgate]].
document_data.Activities: Sehlmari was the morale officer and quartermaster of the [[Mercenaries' Guild of Westgate]]. She always went a day ahead of the troops with a platoon to buy, gather, or commandeer food, drink, and other necessities. She was a master haggler, always taking what she needed for the troops. Sehlmari had also a lovable sense of humor.
